function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of wearables to manage symptoms without professional medical oversight","Impact":"Potential mismanagement of symptoms and health risks","Mitigation":"Encourage medical supervision and use wearables as a supplementary tool","Technologies":"Medical supervision, smart algorithms for symptom monitoring","People":"Individuals with long COVID, chronic illness patients","Owner":"Medical professionals, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Ethical considerations in repurposing consumer devices for healthcare","Impact":"Unintended consequences, data privacy concerns, and regulatory challenges","Mitigation":"Ethical review of device use, data protection measures, collaboration with healthcare regulators","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data transmission, ethical guidelines for device use","People":"Manufacturers, healthcare regulators, data subjects","Owner":"Ethics committees, regulatory authorities, manufacturers"},{"Description":"Biosurveillance concerns with wearable devices providing detailed health data","Impact":"Privacy invasion, potential misuse of health data, surveillance concerns","Mitigation":"Stringent data protection measures, user consent and control over data sharing, ethical oversight","Technologies":"Secure data storage, encryption, user-controlled data sharing","People":"Wearable users, public at large","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, data protection agencies, wearable manufacturers"}]}
